name: Plane and Nimble
description:
Control both the plane and the player and avoid obstacles by making the the player jump and the plane fly up or go down.

The player must not hit molehills and rocks and the plane must not get hit by birds, kites and flying saucers, and also not hit the ground, rocks and molehills. And don't fly too high, otherwise the plane switches off and you'll have to take another shot as well.

Make the player jump by pressing space or touching the left side of your screen, the plane will fly up when you touch the up arrow button or the right side and fly towards the ground as long as you don't.

You'll get a point each time an obstacle can't hit your player or the plane anymore.
